Application.Domain

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Domain.Question

  • @Entity
public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Question is the class that maps the database Entity Question. A Question is part of a Quiz and it is made of both the text and the answers.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea
